about_the_game:
You have 72 hours to deliver the cargo to your customers.
• Customers come to the cargo office. Dozens of cargoes accumulate during the day.
• There will also be cargoes coming from out of town.
• You have 72 hours, i.e. 3 days, to distribute all the cargoes.
• If you cannot deliver the cargo to the addresses in the requested time, you will be penalized.

Therefore, determine and distribute the cargoes that need to be distributed as a priority.


There are many cargoes that need to be transported urgently. Haven't you chosen which vehicle to use yet? You can also carry cargo boxes on foot, but this can be a waste of time. Buy a bicycle, motorcycle or car and carry more cargo faster.

When you start the game, you have enough money to feed your hungry stomach.

Therefore, you will distribute cargo packages on foot.

As you earn money, buy bags to distribute more packages.

As you earn a little more money, you can buy a bicycle and move faster.

As you earn more money, you can buy yourself panel vans and establish a fleet. You can do more work by giving your vehicles to your employees. There are many more features like this. (This feature is not available in this version.)


Use the scale to deceive customers or be an honest deliveryman.
• You must weigh the packages of the incoming customers first.
• You must enter the weight of the package into the system.
• You must collect your money from the customer and then it is ready for delivery.

You quit your job and moved to a city to be your own boss. Although the town is small, it is constantly growing. It is building new streets. The biggest problem of this happy and peaceful town is that there is no cargo company in the town. You can take advantage of this opportunity and develop and establish your own cargo company in this town that will become a city. Your goal is to be the only cargo company in this town.

Starting from a small warehouse to a large warehouse, establish your own cargo company!

You have many customers waiting in line. Don't keep your customers waiting in line, pay their bills quickly!

You quit your job and moved to a city to be your own boss. Although the town is small, it is constantly growing. It is building new streets. The biggest problem of this happy and peaceful town is that there is no cargo company in the town. You can also take advantage of this opportunity and develop and establish your own cargo company in this town that will become a city. Your goal is to be the only cargo company in this town.

Starting from a small warehouse to a large warehouse, establish your own cargo company!

You have many customers waiting in line. Don't keep your customers waiting in line, pay their bills quickly!

name: My Corp Cargo Simulator : Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 3470 / AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 550 4GB / NVIDIA GT 1030
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core I7 3770 / AMD Ryzen5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 3060 / AMD RX 6600
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Start and grow your own cargo company! Make fast and reliable deliveries to your customers by foot, bike, motorcycle or car. Improve your business by making strategic decisions. Build your cargo empire in this simulation game where you will feel like a real entrepreneur.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese*, Japanese*, Korean*, Russian*, Turkish*, Dutch*, Arabic*
*languages with full audio support
